tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE key_certificate_mapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    key_id INT NOT NULL,
    cert_id INT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (key_id) REFERENCES encryption_keys(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (cert_id) REFERENCES certificates(cert_id)
);

CREATE TABLE key_usage (
    key_id UUID,
    cert_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (key_id) REFERENCES encryption_keys(key_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (cert_id) REFERENCES certificates(cert_id),
    PRIMARY KEY (key_id, cert_id)
);
